hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf $WORKSPACE/* . /root/dp/func-master.sh && prepare_env cd /root/dp/testing/jmeter
rm -f *.log
# CLIENT prepare ssh $CLIENT_HOST /bin/bash <<EOF . /root/dp/func-client.sh && prepare_env cd dp/testing/jmeter rm -f ~/dp/stats/* rm -f *.log cat /sys/devices/system/cpu/online start_monitoring ./start-server.sh </dev/null EOF
# SERVER prepare ssh $SERVER_HOST /bin/bash <<EOF . /root/dp/func-server.sh && prepare_env dp/prepare-echo-server.sh </dev/null rm -f ~/dp/stats/* start_monitoring EOF
# START THE BENCHMARK, blocks ./start-jmeter.sh $TEST
# SERVER stop ssh $SERVER_HOST /bin/bash <<EOF . /root/dp/func-server.sh && prepare_env dp/stop-echo-server.sh stop_monitoring EOF
# CLIENT stop ssh $CLIENT_HOST /bin/bash <<EOF . /root/dp/func-client.sh && prepare_env cd dp/testing/jmeter stop_monitoring ./stop-server.sh EOF
cd $WORKSPACE # COLLECT OUTPUT cp /root/dp/testing/jmeter/jmeter.log . scp $SERVER_HOST:dp/jboss-eap-6.3/standalone/log/server.log . scp $SERVER_HOST:dp/stats/* . scp $CLIENT_HOST:dp/stats/* . scp $CLIENT_HOST:dp/testing/jmeter/jmeter-server.log .
# cleanup
